page.title: 18LOCAL GOVERNMENT BRIDGEND
page.content: {A WORKING DAY IN THE CHIEF EXECUTIVE'S {SECRETARIAT OF OGWR BOROUGH COUNCIL. 8.30-9.30.Read the mail,discussed staffing with Office Services Sup.vis. 9.30-10.15.Discussed footpath problem. 10.15-10.30.Tea-break. 10.30-1.00.Dictated letters and draft reports for committees dealing with mortgages,improvement grants,footpaths 1.00-2.00 Lunch. 2.00-2.30.Meeting of Council'Mortgages and Improvement grants Sub-Committee. 2.30-3.15.Discussions regarding stores and stock control. 3.15-3.30.Teabreak. 3.30-4.15.Met the environmental health officer. 4.15-4.30.Met Chief Exec.re.provision of swimming pools. 4.30-4.50.Met old-age pensioner. 4.50-5.00.Overcame problem of posting Recorded Delivery Letters on time.
